summary: "Enola Holmes" is a 2020 mystery movie starring Millie Bobby Brown as Enola, Sherlock Holmes' teenage sister. She goes to London to find her missing mom and teams up with a runaway lord to solve a mystery threatening the country. The film is based on Nancy Springer's novel and was directed by Harry Bradbeer. It was first set to be released in theaters but moved to Netflix due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The movie got good reviews, and a sequel came out in 2022.
title: Enola Holmes (film)
